item.title: Using Docker Cloud on Scaleway vps
item.description: Docker cloud Docker Cloud (formerly Tutum) help to deploy containers image on node clusters. Nodes can be provisioned directly from the service (Digital Ocean, Azure, AWS, Packet.net, and IBM SoftLayer). Additionally is possible to use the function Bring your own node (BYON) to add any linux server connected to the internet as node and deploy on it. I’m using this service to manage a stack (a set of images described by a file similar to docker-compose.
